The best ideas arrive at the most arbitrary moments. At sixmo, it might be while devouring hot kachoris or watching cats on Youtube. Alternatively, we research and brainstorm, OD\'ing on unsafe amounts of caffeine. (Wikipedia + filter coffee = heaven). Either way, you can rest assured that all projects begin with good research and ideation.
Write a short description about your event.
Our Representative will contact you for the verification process
Your Device is not connected. Please check your connection settings and continue.

Sixmo has been established primarily as an event management company for all kinds of events. We are your go – to guys for events varying from Weddings, DJ night parties, birthday parties, private parties to corporate events. We started out in the year2013 and are currently established in Bangalore. Our team has been privileged to have organized events in almost all the happening places of our beloved city. We also indulge in promotions and advertising. Our aim always has been to build long term relationships with our clients and provide them with innovative and satisfying services. Our photography and model management services are also known for their quality and credibility. Summing it up, we are a group intended on entertaining you to your hearts’ content and providing you with all the right kind of services. As we say here, all you have to do is dream and we at Sixmo say “Damn right!!”

We are decoders of the common language uniting brands with their consumers. Keeping things simple and minimal is the key to everything we do. It’s true, we produce inspirational and thoughtful work, yet we’re a humble bunch. We at Orange offers an \"all-round\" service. So whether you need a digital solution, print, media, or a multi faceted campaign, we have the expertise to make it happen, on time.

RCS is the Bangalore\'s leading modelling agency. Having an elite reputation for providing top-class international models, hostesses, promotional staff and entertainers which is second to none. We provide high-quality services including model training, events management and exclusive productions to all forms of agencies and companies, including all forms of marketing communications.
